Can you please decrease the height of the dialog boxes? On smaller resolutions for example the update creation wizzards window is often too high to fit on the screen, so i can't reach the buttons on the buttom of the window. If I manually decrease the height of the window, its contents will be messed up in some strange kind of behaviour.
Maybe it would be a nice solution also to "outsource" some of the generally not so often used buttons and fields of the wizzard to an extra window reachable through an "Extended options" button or something like that, to decrease the needed space on the dialog box.
I know that the UI need to be refactored. WPP V2 will have a better UI.
Do you have an ETA for v2?
